abstrac: How can I improve your production?
bio:
My strengths are data reporting and server side programming.I can design, manage, manipulate, and display data how you want and need it to be done.  Reports, webpages, PivotTables, etc.I have recent experience with t-sql, PL/SQL, and MySQL, Perl, Java, PHP, JavaScript, JSP, HTML5, CSS.

I prefer to work offsite with occassional on site visits, when feasible, or online meetings via GoToMeeting, when onsite is not feasible.

abstrac: Easy to contact; easy to find; buy local.
bio:
Well, first of all, I'm retired.  Why is that an advantage to you?  I don't have to scramble for jobs and money; therefore, I do freelancing because I enjoy it, and I can give your project the love and attention it deserves.

I was an English teacher in the juvenile justice system for 10 years, and then I supervised a training center at a major regional law firm for 15 years.  Later on, I handled all the documents at a construction/design firm.  The common theme in all my jobs has been words, words, words.  I am proud to call myself a wordsmith.
Whatever the customer requires.
